projects.name: PieShop
projects.content: A fictional pie shop web-application, based on two Pluralsight courses, built upon ASP .NET Core 2.0 MVC framework. Allows ordering pies, leaving reviews, allows multiple roles including administrative roles. I used Entity Framework Core for mapping entities to database. Postgres as database, Serilog as a logger, JQuery for the client-side, internal model-binding, authorization, caching, xUnit for tests.
projects.keywords: ASP .NET Core 2 MVC, Identity, EntityFramework Core, Javascript, JQuery, Gulp, Postgres, HTML5, CSS3

projects.name: MonopolyBot
projects.content: A bot for Telegram platform, developed in C# using Telegram.Bot library, allows to play «Monopoly» game in Telegram chat. To render in-game players on the monopoly board I used ImageSharp library. Also following technologies were used: Autofac as IoC Container, NUnit as unit-testing framework, NLog as a logger.

projects.name: Ticket-Monster
projects.content: A single-page WildFly based Java web-application, using Hibernate, Maven, Backbone.js, JQuery, Underscore.
projects.keywords: WildFly, Java EE, JQuery, Backbone, Underscore

degree.name: Bachelor of Arts in International Relations
degree.place: L. N. Gumilyov Eurasian National University
